messages.content:
[
  {
    "screen_number": 1,
    "voiceover_text": "Introducing [Product Name], the next evolution in [industry or solution]!",
    "target_duration_sec": 5,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Company logo animation, product name reveal, dynamic background, brand colors, modern font",
    "action_notes": "Logo animates in, product name appears with a subtle glow effect"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 2,
    "voiceover_text": "Are you tired of [main problem]? Traditional solutions just don’t cut it anymore.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "stock video",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Frustrated users, inefficient workflows, outdated tools, slow computers, stressed expressions",
    "action_notes": "Quick montage, fast cuts between scenes showing the problem"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 3,
    "voiceover_text": "[Product Name] is designed to solve [problem] with cutting-edge features.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Product hero shot, close-up of device or interface, smooth transitions, product rotating",
    "action_notes": "Camera pans across product, interface lights up"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 4,
    "voiceover_text": "Enjoy real-time [feature 1], seamless [feature 2], and powerful [feature 3].",
    "target_duration_sec": 12,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Animated highlights of dashboard, automation, analytics, feature icons, UI elements",
    "action_notes": "Features animate in one by one, UI highlights key actions"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 5,
    "voiceover_text": "Perfect for [target users or use cases], [Product Name] fits right into your daily routine.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "stock video",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "User interacting with product, improved workflow, happy expressions, seamless integration",
    "action_notes": "User smiles while using product, workflow animation overlays"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 6,
    "voiceover_text": "See measurable results: save time, reduce errors, and boost productivity.",
    "target_duration_sec": 10,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Before/after comparison, stats pop up, testimonial quotes, upward graphs",
    "action_notes": "Split screen before/after, stats animate in, testimonial text fades up"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 7,
    "voiceover_text": "Ready to upgrade? Visit [website] or scan to schedule your demo today!",
    "target_duration_sec": 10,
    "screen_type": "cta",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Website URL, QR code, 'Book a demo' button, company logo, brand colors",
    "action_notes": "QR code pulses, CTA button animates, logo holds at end"
  }
]
